posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. These are lower grade cards as the scans will show. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:

**ALL CARDS SOLD**
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
Sweeney have any creases? If not I'll take it and the d jones
